mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM transaction WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId}

SELECT transaction_id, owner_user_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date, asset_id, category_id_level1, category_id_level2, memo, source_type, fixed_cost_template_id FROM transaction WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId} AND owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction ( transaction_id, owner_user_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date, asset_id, memo, category_id_level1, category_id_level2, source_type, fixed_cost_template_id ) VALUES ( #{transactionId}, #{ownerUserId}, #{transactionType}, #{amount}, #{transactionDate}, #{assetId}, #{memo}, #{categoryIdLevel1}, #{categoryIdLevel2}, #{sourceType}, #{fixedCostTemplateId} )
